Uses of Class
imagingbook.pub.geometry.mappings.linear.LinearMapping2D

  • Packages that use LinearMapping2D 
    Package Description
    imagingbook.pub.geometry.mappings.linear  
    imagingbook.pub.lucaskanade.utils  

    • Uses of LinearMapping2D in imagingbook.pub.geometry.mappings.linear

      Subclasses of LinearMapping2D in imagingbook.pub.geometry.mappings.linear 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  AffineMapping2D
      This class represents an affine transformation in 2D, which can be defined by three pairs of corresponding points.
      class  ProjectiveMapping2D
      This class represents a projective transformation in 2D (also known as a "homography").
      class  Rotation2D
      This class represents a pure 2D rotation about the coordinate origin (as a special case of affine mapping).
      class  Scaling2D
      This class represents a 2D scaling transformation (as a special case of affine transformation).
      class  Shear2D
      This class represents a 2D shear transformation (as a special case of affine transformation).
      class  Translation2D
      This class represents a pure 2D translation (as a special case of affine transformation).
      Methods in imagingbook.pub.geometry.mappings.linear that return LinearMapping2D 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      LinearMapping2D LinearMapping2D.concat​(LinearMapping2D B)
      Concatenates this mapping A with another linear mapping B and returns a new mapping C, such that C(x) = B(A(x)).
      static LinearMapping2D LinearMapping2D.concatenate​(LinearMapping2D... AA)
      Concatenates a sequence of linear mappings AA = (A1, A2, ..., An), with the result A(x) = A1(A2(...(An(x))...)).
      LinearMapping2D LinearMapping2D.duplicate()
      Returns a copy of this mapping.
      LinearMapping2D LinearMapping2D.getInverse()
      Calculates and returns the inverse mapping.
      Methods in imagingbook.pub.geometry.mappings.linear with parameters of type LinearMapping2D

      Constructors in imagingbook.pub.geometry.mappings.linear with parameters of type LinearMapping2D 
      Constructor Description
      LinearMapping2D​(LinearMapping2D lm)
      Creates a new linear mapping from an existing linear mapping.
      ProjectiveMapping2D​(LinearMapping2D m)
      Creates a projective mapping from any linear mapping.
